header.title: Welcome to Our E-Banking Platform
header.subTitle: Experience seamless and secure online banking services at your fingertips. Manage your finances conveniently from anywhere, anytime.

Hssab1.subTitle: Our offer allows you to make secure payments and transactions with a limit of 200 DH. Perfect for small daily expenses, our solution ensures simplicity and speed. Enjoy a reliable service tailored to your needs. Sign up now to discover all the benefits!

Hssab2.subTitle: Our offer allows you to make secure payments and transactions up to a limit of 10,000 DH. Ideal for significant operations, it combines reliability and efficiency. Manage your finances with peace of mind using our optimized service. Join us today to take advantage of this solution!

Hssab3.subTitle: Our offer allows you to make secure payments and transactions up to a limit of 15,000 DH. Designed for large operations, it guarantees performance and security. Simplify your transactions while enjoying a premium service. Sign up now to take full advantage!

Hssab4.subTitle: Our offer allows you to make secure payments and transactions up to a limit of 20,000 DH. Perfect for large-scale transactions, it combines speed and security. Manage your operations with confidence using our reliable solution. Join us today to discover its advantages!

LearMore.title: Find all the answers to your questions.

section1.title: What is FlowPay ?
section1.desc: FlowPay is an e-banking application that allows you to manage your personal finances, make payments, and securely view your transactions.

section2.title: Who can use FlowPay?
section2.desc: Anyone with a bank account at partner banks.

section3.title: Is FlowPay available in multiple languages?
section3.desc: Yes, FlowPay supports multiple languages, including French, English.

section4.title: Is FlowPay secure ?
section4.desc: Absolutely. FlowPay uses advanced encryption protocols (SSL/TLS) and two-factor authentication (2FA) to ensure your data is safe.

section5.title: How do I create an account on FlowPay?
section5.desc: Check our Platform, register with your email address, and link your bank accounts by following the guided steps.

email.text: Write to us with your inquiries or questions, and our advisors will respond via email.

phone.text: Our advisors are available to answer all your questions.

transactionsSes.title: Transfer your money with ease and security
transactionsSes.miniTitle: Zero effort, and FlowPay becomes your No. 1
transactionsSes.p1: Do you want to transfer all your recurring payments and direct debits from your main current account to your Fortuneo account? Just ask! We promise, it's simple!
transactionsSes.p2: An IBAN and an online signature are all it takes: we handle all the banking mobility procedures with your various organizations.
